movies.title: J'entends plus la guitare
movies.plot: For those who were young, living under the delusions of love and soft drugs in Paris, May 1968 - even if the guitar is still playing, they can't hear it any longer.
movies.simplePlot: For those who were young, living under the delusions of love and soft drugs in Paris, May 1968 - even if the guitar is still playing, they can't hear it any longer.

biography.bio: Benoît Régent was born on August 19, 1953 in Nantes, Loire-Atlantique, France as Benoît Michel Régent. He was an actor, known for Three Colors: Blue (1993), Three Colors: Red (1994) and The Gang of Four (1989). He was married to Marilyne Canto. He died on October 22, 1994 in Zurich, Switzerland.
biography.name: Benoît Régent

biography.bio: From 1979 to 1984 Johanna ter Steege studied at the academy of dramatic art in Kampen to become a drama teacher. Her initial desire to develop theatre for and with children prompted her to seek a career as an actress and a teacher. From 1984 to 1988 she attended the school of acting at Arnhem to become a stage actress. Considering acting "the language of the heart", one of the most important things she learned was that the personnel and creative development of an actor are closely knit. Her acting experience ranges from Shakespeare, Sophocles, Strindberg and Chekhov to improvisory clown acts. At the academy, collaboration with fellow students resulted in the very successful theatre group "De Trust", directed by Boermans. In 1987 Johanna was asked for a role in the film L'homme qui voulait savoir (1988) (aka "The Vanishing"), directed by George Sluizer. This role met international acclaim, winning her the "Felix Award" (Best Supporting Actress) in Berlin. Inevitably, her career shifted from the theatre to the cinema. For the past twelve years she has traveled all over the world, acting in different languages and working with renowned directors, such as Robert Altman (Vincent et Théo (1990)), István Szabó (Chère Emma (1992), aka "Sweet Emma, Dear Bobe"), Heddy Honigmann (Goodbye (1995) aka "Goodbye", for which she won Best Actress at the Locarno International Film Festival) and Bruce Beresford (Paradise Road (1997)). Johanna has also worked with actors such as Glenn Close, Frances McDormand, Isabella Rossellini, Gary Oldman, Tim Roth and Klaus Maria Brandauer. In January 2001 ter Steege played Countess Geschwitz, in the play "Lulu", directed by Jonathan Kent, both in the Almeida theatre in London and in Washington.
biography.name: Johanna ter Steege

biography.bio: Yann Collette was born on April 14, 1956 in Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes, France. He is an actor, known for Immortel (ad vitam) (2004), La journée de la jupe (2008) and Le bossu (1997).
biography.name: Yann Collette

biography.bio: Mireille Perrier was born on November 14, 1959 in Blois, France. She is an actress, known for Point Blank (2010), Toto le héros (1991) and Boy Meets Girl (1984).
biography.name: Mireille Perrier

biography.bio: Brigitte Sy is an actress and writer, known for La guerre est déclarée (2011), Les baisers de secours (1989) and L'astragale (2015).
biography.name: Brigitte Sy

biography.bio: Anouk Grinberg was born on March 20, 1963 in Uccle, Belgium. She is an actress, known for A Self-Made Hero (1996), My Man (1996) and Un, deux, trois, soleil (1993).
biography.name: Anouk Grinberg

biography.bio: Adélaïde Blasquez is an actress, known for J'entends plus la guitare (1991), La possédée (1971) and Belle de Jour (1967).
biography.name: Adélaïde Blasquez

biography.bio: Philippe Morier-Genoud was born on March 2, 1944. He is an actor, known for Au Revoir Les Enfants (1987), Cyrano de Bergerac (1990) and Three Colors: White (1994).
biography.name: Philippe Morier-Genoud

biography.bio: Edith Boulogne was born as Édith Arnold. She is an actress, known for Nico Icon (1995) and J'entends plus la guitare (1991).
biography.name: Edith Boulogne

biography.bio: Thomas Salsmann was born on November 10, 1981. He is known for his work on La désenchantée (1990), Siestes (2001) and J'entends plus la guitare (1991).
biography.name: Thomas Salsmann

biography.bio: Alexis Piccolo is an actor, known for J'entends plus la guitare (1991).
biography.name: Alexis Piccolo

biography.bio: Chantal Trichet is an actress, known for They Came Back (2004), J'entends plus la guitare (1991) and Trois mondes (2012).
biography.name: Chantal Trichet
